text.section: In addition to any other powers granted and duties imposed by this title, the Office has the powers and duties set forth in this section.

section.section: The Office may adopt any rule or regulation necessary to carry out its powers and duties.

The rules and regulations adopted by the Office under paragraph (1) of this subsection may include provisions for:
The performance of a service obligation for a program that as a condition of award requires a recipient of student financial assistance to perform a service obligation;
The repayment of student financial assistance funds received should a recipient fail to perform a service obligation; and
Waiver and deferment of a service obligation or repayment in circumstances determined by the Commission.

text.section:
The Office:
Shall administer any federal program of scholarships or grants to students or institutions except for the Christa McAuliffe Fellowship which shall be administered by the Maryland State Department of Education; and
May do anything necessary to comply with any federal law relating to these scholarships or grants.

The Office shall:
Arrange for the competitive examination required of applicants for certain scholarships; and
Send the results of the examination to the appropriate institutions and to the person who awards the scholarship.

The Office shall:
Analyze under uniform standards the financial need of each applicant for a scholarship for which financial need is a consideration; and
Send its analysis to the appropriate institution and the person who awards the scholarship.
